title: Big Bend National Park
description: In April 2012, my school took a class trip to Big Bend.

photos.description: A stream and some representative landscape.
photos.alt: A stream surrounded by mostly flat, dry brush.

photos.description: A deer. Also a cactus to prove this is a southwestern deer.
photos.alt: A deer standing among tall, dry grass.

photos.description: A cool window in the rocks. I think that's not water on the ground, just very slick rock, so you probably shouldn't walk too close.
photos.alt: A narrow opening between two large rocks overlooking the ground below.

photos.description: A rock on a bigger rock with nice light and shadows.
photos.alt: Dark shadows cast on a rock.
